title: STOP CHANGING MY RUNEPAGE
body:
I AM WRITING THIS IN FULL CAPS I AM SO ANGRY THAT THIS IS STILL HAPPENING. I AM SO SICK OF CLOSING THE CLIENT OR HAVING IT CRASH, GO INTO A NEW GAME, AND THEN REALISING THAT YOU HAVE DEFAULTED MY GODDAMN RUNE PAGE TO RESOLVE. IF THE NEW RUNES WEREN'T GODAWFUL ENOUGH ALREADY, WE HAVE THIS NONSENSE THAT MAKES LANING PRETTY MUCH NULL AND VOID BECAUSE GRASP LUX IS THE BEST THING SINCE SLICED BREAD, OBVIOUSLY.

YOU DARE TOUCH MY RUNE PAGES, RIOT? THIS IS AS BAD AS NOT BEING ABLE TO DELETE THE FOUR BASE RUNEPAGES THAT ARE ALWAYS THERE. I DON'T CARE ABOUT THEM. MY GOD.

replies.body: I do agree this is annoying when it happens, and the same thing happens to me with skins as well. I play with the same skin every time consistently (let's use the example of Garen, I only use Warring Kingdoms Garen, yet it randomly selects Sanguine or Desert Trooper whatever that skin is called yet I've NEVER played the Desert one before let alone most of his skins I own). There are certain champions for me that this happens most often with, and I don't understand if there's an underlying system to try to get me to use my least used skins but it's such a tilter when you only realise on the loading screen cos I was busy browsing memes after locking in. (This has happened so many time with Sanguine Garen, and really Rito I don't want to look like I'm wearing bacon the entire game). :)

It is so hard to change page with with 2 clicks within what?  Some insanely long lobby timer now?
I can't do it, RESOLVE LYF!!!

Hey Hey Hey.

Everyone is adamant that there are no Rune page bugs, and that you don't need to buy rune pages.

So if your experiencing bugs, it must be all your fault in some way or another, and nothing to do with the shitty client we have that is about as reliable as a dog shitting on a carpet (So reliable, but only in that, you know what is going to happen and can rely on that)
